DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effectiveness target burn prevention message burn safety knowledge behavior .
DOC.brief_title: Development Evaluation Adult Burn Prevention Program
DOC.detailed_description: Flammable liquid burn comprise 23 % admission burn center . This project test uptake message `` Do n't Flaming Fool '' deliver via multi-media campaign .
DOC.criteria: male 16 year age old Exclusion criterion males less 16 year age female
